the air and ambiance made couples feels lucky to be together .

output.sentences: The day is beautiful for a tourist boat ride.
All of the people on the boat seem to be enjoying the tour.
People are amazed by the size of the bridge.
As the boat travels under the bridge, everyone looks up.
After the tour, people look at the bridge from the shoreline.
